description: Zero stars if possible because the app does not lauch at all in the latest (5.25) version of Neon (KDE). Wish developers would test the app in popular DEs like KDE to make sure at the very least it will launch. Recommend this app is removed from the Discover Store because it is definitely broken. Making available broken apps like this in a popular distro only further reinforces frustration.
summary: DOES NOT WORK in KDE Neon

description: The app didn't start under GNOME 3.38.5 under PureOS 10 (which is based on Debian 11 bullseye), but I used Flatseal to examine the sockets list and only Wayland was enabled. I'm using Xorg, so all I had to do was enable X11 and the app started. This will probably work for KDE. I didn't do much testing, so can't really give anything other than a 3-star.
summary: Used Flatseal to enable X11 socket so app would start
